text: Groupement Sportif des Pétroliers or GS Pétroliers is an Algerian sports club founded June 2, 2008. It represents the largest national oil company Sonatrach. ==History== Formally known as MC Alger (Mouloudia Club d'Alger). It joined the Groupement Sportif des Pétroliers (a multi-sports club) and changed the name on June 2, 2008. == Honours (handball) == === National titles === * Algerian Handball Championship ::Champion (24): 1982, 1984, 1987, 1988, 1989, 1990, 1991, 1992, 1994, 1995, 1997, 1998, 1999, 2000, 2001, 2002, 2003, 2005, 2006, 2007, 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011 * Algerian Handball Cup ::Winner (24): 1982, 1983, 1987, 1989, 1990, 1991, 1993, 1994, 1995, 1997, 1998, 1999, 2000, 2001, 2002, 2003, 2004, 2005, 2006, 2007, 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011 === International titles (handball) === * African Handball Champions League ::Champion (11): 1983, 1997, 1998, 1999, 2000, 2003, 2004, 2005, 2006, 2008, 2009 ::Runner-up (2): 1985, 2010 * African Handball Cup Winners' Cup ::Champion (9): 1988, 1991, 1992, 1993, 1994, 1995, 1997, 1998, 1999 ::Runner- up (3): 1989, 1990, 1996 * African Handball Super Cup ::Champion (9): 1994, 1995, 1996, 1997, 1998, 1999, 2004, 2005, 2006 ::Runner-up (1): 2010 * Arab Club Handball Championship ::Champion (2): 1989, 1991 ::Runner-up (1): 1993 ::Third place (2): 1996, 2001 * IHF Super Globe ::Third place (1): 2007 ==External links== *Team's profile - kooora.com Category:Groupement Sportif des Pétroliers Category:Algerian handball clubs Category:Handball clubs established in 1964
title: GS Pétroliers (handball)
